name: Skeletal Resistance
summary: Your body becomes resistant, your hardened bones deflecting weapons and other forms of damage.
description:
Your body becomes resistant, your hardened bones deflecting weapons and other forms of damage. You gain resistance 2 to cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing damage. This resistance increases to 3 at 13th level and 4 at 17th level.Traits

Skeleton: This undead is made by animating a dead creatureâ€™s skeleton with negative energy.
